rooms.description: Central open space serving as the entry foyer with adjacent seating area, following Vastu by placing the main entrance in the south-eastern direction.
Spacious bedroom with a private balcony facing north, ensuring ample natural light and ventilation. Features built-in wardrobes and luxury finishes as per modern demands in traditional Kerala style.
Cozy bedroom with a balcony on the west side to catch the setting sun, adhering to Vastu principles for guest relaxation and privacy.
Functional kitchen space located towards the south-west corner, incorporating traditional Kerala elements such as tiled walls and large window openings for natural light and cross ventilation.
Open dining area adjacent to the kitchen with ample seating space. Design includes low wooden furniture in traditional Kerala style, fostering a communal atmosphere.
Small utility room for storing cleaning supplies and kitchen appliances. Placed towards the north-east as per Vastu guidelines to promote energy flow.
